document.full_text: china said on tuesday that western air strikes on libya risked a "humanitarian disaster," adding to the chorus of criticism from big emerging powers over the u.n.-authorized campaign.
document.title: emerging powers join in opposition over libya strikes
lines_and_colors: china said on tuesday that western air strikes on libya risked a "humanitarian disaster," adding to the chorus of criticism from big emerging powers over the u.n.-authorized campaign.
